title: Dinosaur King (Dub)
alternative_title: Kodai Ouja Kyouryuu King, Kodai Oja Kyoryu King D-Kids Adventure, Ancient Ruler Dinosaur King, 古代王者 恐竜キング Ｄキッズアドベンチャー
description: Max, Rex, and Zoe are three friends that are members of a group known as the D-Team. They just want to have fun and build their friendship, but that all changes when they find three fossil shaped items in the forest. Before they know it, the D-Team is thrust into a quest to save prehistoric dinosaurs, trapped as cards, from a mysterious time traveling organization known as The Alpha Gang. Whichever group can gather all the cards first will become the Dinosaur King.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Space>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
